tool_description: An API showing all the latest news about Elon Musk, Tesla, SpaceX and Boring Company!
name: Elon News
title: Elon News

api_list.name: Get all news about Elon Musk
api_list.description: This endpoint returns back all of the latest news about Elon Musk
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://elon-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "elon-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://elon-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "elon-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
